rules_text:
Incarnate {2}{U}{B} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
When target creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw two cards.
Menace
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
